## Advanced Contract Award Notice: Femtosecond Pulsed Laser System

### Introduction

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) intends to award a contract for the provision of a femtosecond pulsed laser system to support the expansion of fabrication activities and align with the organization's environmental stewardship objectives.

### Technical Requirements

The contractor must provide a femtosecond pulsed laser system operating within the wavelength range of 690nm to 1580nm. The system must include:

1. Automated, mode-locked Ti:Sapphire lasers (2)
2. Rack mountable power supplies and chillers (2)
3. Infrared Optical Parametric Oscillator

The system must meet the following requirements:

1. Automated, mode-locked Ti:Sapphire lasers:
   * Tuning range: 690nm - 1040nm
   * Pulse duration: 2.5W at 800nm
   * Average power:
     + 500mW at 690nm
     + 1.35W at 710nm
     + 1.35W at 920nm
     + 300mW at 1040nm
   * Beam pointing stability: < 50urad/100nm
   * On-board diagnostics for remote service capability
2. Infrared Optical Parametric Oscillator:
   * Sealed unit, hands-free operation
   * Automated, active cavity length stabilization
   * Tuning range: 1000nm - 1580nm
   * Spatial mode: TEM00, M2<1.1
   * Pulse width: 200fsec
   * Noise: < 0.5% rms
   * Pump wavelength: 720nm - 810nm

### Trade Agreements

The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization – Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)

### Exclusions and Limited Tendering Reasons

Only one vendor is able to meet the unique technical requirements listed herein. The following exception to the Government Contracts Regulations is invoked for this procurement under subsection 6(d) as only one supplier is capable of performing work.

### Proposal Submission Instructions

Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the goods, services, or construction services described in this ACAN may submit a statement of capabilities in writing within 15 days to the contact person identified in this notice on or before the closing date of March 15
